requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 512 Mb or equivalent
  • Storage: 100 MB MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

Recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760

requirements_en.recommended:

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP
  • Processor: Intel Pentium IV or AMD Athlon 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 mb video card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: V-Sync must be enabled

Minimum:
  • OS: 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Better
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 or Better Display

Minimum:

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with OpenGL
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
